A borrower who receives GHC 1,000 from Taploan Up with a period of 90 days would need to pay the loan with an interest rate of 0.05%. 
The total interest is GHC 1,000 * 0.05% * 90 = GHC 45
The total payment amount is GHC 1,000 + GHC 45 = GHC 1,045
The monthly payment amount is GHC 1,045 / 3 = GHC 348.33

Fido is licensed by the Bank of Ghana, Bank of Uganda and the National Credit Regulator (South Africa). We create opportunities for growth in Africa by changing the way individuals and entrepreneurs create, manage and build wealth. Enjoy instant financial services, such as access to business credit, savings,  personal credit, and easy, cost-effective payments.
Build your financial track record with Fido Score to take control over your finances and unlock improved offerings from Fido and our partners.

Here's what we offer:
- Fido Business: Boost your business growth with Fido Biz Loans, offering up to GHS 5,000 to move your business forward.
- Fido Score: Build your financial track record and control of your finances with Fido Score. Take actions to improve your Fido Score and unlock improved offerings.
- Fido Savings: Put your money to work and prepare for your future with our high-interest savings product.
- Personal Credit: Get  an instantly pre-approved GHC100-4,000 credit line to meet your needs. It's fast, simple and transparent.
- Fido Payments: Pay bills, buy data, and airtime effortlessly. Each purchase improves your Fido Score.

Here's how to sign up to Fido:
- Download the Fido App and register only once.
- Confirm your details with a valid ID (NIN / Ghana Card) and an address.
- You must be over the age of 18.
- Complete the Fido Score assessment.
- If you are a business, complete you business information.
- Kindly note Minimum Repayment period: 90 days and Maximum Repayment period: 365 days.
- We accept MTN, ATT & Vodafone Mobile Money wallets.

Here's how to repay:


Ghana:
- Log into the Fido App, select the 'Make a Payment' button and follow the prompts.
- You can also dial *998# to repay.
- For other options like using the MTN, AirtelTigo and Vodafone menus, find the repayment process in the Fido App 'Help' section.


Uganda:
Via the Fido App: Log in and tap "Pay Back", then follow the prompts.
Via Mobile Money:

- Airtel: Dial *185*9#, enter Merchant ID: 4312373
- MTN Dial *165*4*4#, enter Merchant Code: fido1

Quick payments via USSD:
- Dial *284*300#
- Confirm your payment with your PIN


Beware of Fraudsters:
- Don't pay any deposits to any agents, Fido is a 100% mobile app!
- Don't use a mobile money number that does not belong to you.
- Don't use someone else's Ghana Card.
- Don't apply for someone else.


Fido personal credit and business loans are intended to assist entrepreneurs and individuals with their everyday needs and not to service long-term debt obligations. Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is 36%. Actual rates may be lower, depending on local applicable laws and regulations. This is based on a credit line term of 365 days (one year), an interest of 0.098% per day or 2.94% per month, a processing fee of 295 GHS per credit line, and in certain cases, a deductible commitment fee of up to 1.6%.

Representative Example in Ghana Cedi:
A borrower who receives credit of 2,000 GHS for a 365 days term, will be charged an interest rate of 0.098% per day, thus 408.7 GHS in 365 days, and a processing fee of 295 GHS, summing up to a total repayment of 703.7 GHS. A deductible 1.4% commitment fee is applied, and 28 GHS will be deducted from the principal.

‏In summary: 2,000 GHS (borrowed amount), minus 28 GHS (commitment fee) + 408.7 GHS (interest) + 295 GHS (processing fee) = 2,703.7 GHS (total payment).
The borrower has the flexibility to make early repayments at any point, thereby reducing the above-stated interest.

+233-0596922420 / www.fidocredit.com

We are certified by the Data Protection Commission and hold an ISO 27001 certification.

Find out more: https://www.fidocredit.com/legal-pages/privacy-policy-statement

Product Information:
- Loan Amount: 100 - 6,000 Ghana Cedis
- Loan Term: Minimum 91 days, maximum 180 days
- Annual interest rate: Maximum 20%.
- Daily interest rate: calculated based on the maximum 20%, that is: 20% ÷ 365 = 0.0547%.
- Other fees: 0.
Loan product example calculation:
Take a 6,000 Ghanaian Cedi loan as an example, with a term of 180 days and a daily interest rate of 0.0547%, the total repayment amount is 6,000 Ghanaian Cedi (principal) + (6,000×0.0547%×180) Ghanaian Cedi (interest) = 6,591 Ghanaian Cedi.
How to get cash at AmanfiLoan - UK LTD?
1. Download AmanfiLoan from eligible app stores
2. Select your loan amount
3. Wait for cash to arrive

Fast, transparent personal loans for UAE residents 
 
CashNow lets you secure an instant loan straight from your phone. Our simple 5-step application process can be completed in under five minutes and you can receive funds in their bank account within minutes after approval. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

What makes CashNow stand out? 

Real speed – apply, get a decision, and get approved - on the same day. 

Fixed, easy pricing – AED 150 processing fee plus a flat 6 % interest for the full three-month term. No hidden extra charges. 

Licensed & regulated – CashNow (Quantix Technologies) is licensed by the Central Bank of the UAE 

Paper-free – just your Emirates ID and basic details; no credit documents or bank documents 

Full control – track disbursement, repayment dates, and loan balance inside the app. 

Data security – Your personal information is safe with us.  

Options for everyone: We have variety of lending options from small loans starting from AED 100 to upto AED 30,000. Your repayment history and your credit behaviour can unlock various limits for you.  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Simple cost example 
 

You choose to borrow AED 1,500 at a 3 month tenure:  
→ we deposit AED 1,350 in your account after deducting the AED 150 fee 
→ repay AED 530 each month for three months (total AED 1,590) 

Your repayment amount is fixed on day one—no surprises later. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Eligibility 

→ UAE residents aged 20 – 55 
→ Valid Emirates ID 
→ Regular monthly income 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

How to get your quick loan 

→ Download & install CashNow (it’s free). 
→ Sign up and KYC with Emirates ID  
→ Choose how much you need.  
→ Submit—fill out some basic details and submit. You get a near instant decision on your application 

Receive the money in your bank account if approved, usually within minutes. 
 

That’s it—no branch visits, no paperwork. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ 

Is CashNow safe? 
Yes. We are a licensed and regulated entity by Central Bank of UAE and comply with all UAE lending regulations. 

Can I repay early? 
Absolutely. Early settlement is allowed at any time with a small fee.  

What if I’m declined? 
Our risk algorithm updates frequently so make sure to keep applying every few days!! 
Your application status will not reflect your credit score. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Download CashNow today and solve your cash needs—fast, fair, and fully transparent. 

*T&C Apply

LendQuick offers instant loans to individuals, professionals and businesses with attractive interest rates in less than 24 hours!
Our process takes the stress out of borrowing! Quick disbursals in less than 24 hours, without collateral or bank visits and transferred directly to your wallet. 

LOAN RATES AND REQUIREMENTS
With LendQuick, you can access loan amounts without visiting the bank. Yes, it’s that easy! Depending on the loan amount you are eligible for, you have the option to choose repayment terms for up to 336 days. Every loan amount we offer has the option to repay in a minimum of 62 days.
Our minimum interest rate, which is determined by our credit scoring algorithm, is 3% per month and a maximum of 10% per month. This comes to an Annual Percentage Rate (APR) of 36%.

FOR EXAMPLE;
If you get a personal loan product of N10,000 to pay back over a 3-months tenor at an interest rate and fees of 3% per month (36% APR), you will be paying back N900 in interest. Making your total Principal + Interest repayment of N10,900 only. 

We usually require no collateral. However, you may need to provide a guarantor for specific loans. Also for verification purposes, you will need to submit additional documentation such as a valid ID. We may also require your bank statement for us to confirm your eligibility for a loan. 
Nevertheless, download the app, sign up easily and apply for a loan in minutes!

WANT TO TALK TO US?
We will love to hear your feedback and tips to make our services better for you. If you have any issues navigating the app or have questions, you can reach out by calling +234 906 314 3683 or send an email to info@lendviseryng.com. You can also reach out to us via our social media platforms. 

ADDITIONAL NOTES
When processing your loan request for eligibility, we take several signals into consideration such as past loan performance, credit score and so on. We also require that all details filled in the loan application are correct and verifiable as false details could delay your loan request and your profile may be blacklisted. For cases of fraud, you may be reported to the authorities.

Achieve is a digital platform that provides you with carefully curated financial solutions and plans to help you achieve your financial goals. 

With Achieve, you can say goodbye to the daunting task of searching for the investment vehicle that fits you best. 

The Achieve App welcomes easy investing right from the comfort of your phone, or tablet.

Current Products:

DigiSave - DigiSave offers you the flexibility to invest towards your medium to long term goals while having access to your money within the shortest possible time to meet expenses that sneak up on you in the short-term. 

Contributions are automatically invested in the Plus Income Fund - A regulated mutual fund managed by Blackstar Advisors (the "Fund Manager"), and held with Stanbic Bank for safe keeping.



App Features:



1. Sign up​ in a few simple steps.



2. Subscribe to carefully curated financial solutions.​



3. Log In​ whenever, wherever at your own convenience.



4. Verify your ID information to keep safeguard your account against identity theft and fraud.



5. Create subaccounts for easy budgeting.



6. Create goal accounts with a target date and target amount and we will help you keep them on track.



7. Update your Bio Info, contact information, KYC information, and profile picture in a few simple steps whenever necessary.
​
8. Add and manage your Momo Wallet for easy transactions.



9. Withdraw cash from Achieve into your Bank Account or Momo wallet without any hustle. You always have access to your money, no matter what.
​
10. Reset your password when you forget it.​



11. Deposit into your account and watch your savings grow!!




For more information, visit https://theachieveproject.com/. You can also send your questions to answers@theachieveproject.com.

description:
A wallet service that allows you to send money, pay bills, buy airtime and enjoy a host of value added financial services at very low charges.
 
GhanaPay is a wallet service by banks in Ghana, allowing you to enjoy affordable financial services at very low charges. With GhanaPay, you can send money, pay your bills, buy airtime from all network and pay for goods and services.



GhanaPay comes with great value added services, such as a savings pot, crowdfunding (susu), sponsored wallet, round-the-cloud support, fuel top-ups etc. GhanaPay is also available on USSD by dialing *707#.
